resources.string: Recipe: Scrambled Eggs with Spinach and Feta.Ingredients: Eggs, spinach, feta cheese, salt, pepper.
Recipe: Turkey Avocado Wrap.Ingredients: Turkey slices, avocado, lettuce, whole wheat wrap.
Recipe: Chicken Noodle Soup.Ingredients: Chicken broth, chicken, carrots, celery, noodles.
Recipe: Quinoa Salad with Vegetables.Ingredients: Quinoa, cherry tomatoes, cucumber, feta, olive oil.
Recipe: Baked Chicken Tenders with Sweet Potato Fries.Ingredients: Chicken tenders, sweet potatoes, olive oil, spices.
Recipe: Lentil and Vegetable Stir-Fry.Ingredients: Lentils, broccoli, bell peppers, soy sauce.
Recipe: Spaghetti Bolognese.Ingredients: Ground beef, tomatoes, garlic, spaghetti.
